i18n.displayName: The Sims™ 3 Roaring Heights Gold Edition
i18n.longDescription:
Welcome to Roaring Heights, the sparkling city nestled by the beach. Experience an exuberant life amidst a city full of iconic Art Deco skyscrapers. Explore the bustling beachside scene in your fixed-up pristine classic car. Between the breathtaking architecture, lavish parties you’ll throw, and breeze of the beach, the vibe of Roaring Heights is positively golden.

The Gold Edition includes: The Boardwalk Attire set. Enjoy a leisurely night out in a dapper outfit. Your Sims will love the classic style of these outfits that’ll look great anywhere they go.

Features:

• All-New Gameplay Object - Fixer Upper Car. A little elbow grease goes a long way! Spend some time fixing up this baby, then take it for a spin and be the coolest cat on the street!

• A Whole New World Awaits. Meet new Sims, explore new locations, and experience the exuberant world of Roaring Heights.

• Exclusive New Items. Customize your game with dozens of all-new exclusive objects and clothing available only in Roaring Heights.

• Classic The Sims™ 2 Capp Family. The Capp family is on vacation in Roaring Heights and absolutely smitten with this beachside city! Come find out why they’ve decided to move here!
i18n.onlineDisclaimer:
*Requires The Sims™ 3 to play.

THE SIMS 3 BASE GAME, INTERNET CONNECTION, ACCEPTANCE OF END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ("EULA"), LATEST THE SIMS 3 PATCH UPDATE, ORIGIN ACCOUNT, AND REGISTRATION WITH ENCLOSED SINGLE-USE SERIAL CODE REQUIRED TO PLAY AND ACCESS ONLINE SERVICES AND FEATURES. SERIAL CODE REGISTRATION IS LIMITED TO ONE ORIGIN ACCOUNT PER SERIAL CODE. SERIAL CODES ARE NON-TRANSFERABLE ONCE USED AND SHALL BE VALID, AT A MINIMUM, SO LONG AS ONLINE SERVICES ARE AVAILABLE. EA ONLINE PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM. YOU MUST BE 13+ TO ACCESS ONLINE SERVICES AND FEATURES. MAC USERS MUST UPDATE TO THE LATEST VERSION OF THE SIMS 3 LAUNCHER TO ACCESS ONLINE SERVICES AND FEATURES. EULAS AND ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES CAN BE FOUND AT WWW.EA.COM/1/PRODUCT-EULAS . EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE SERVICES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON WWW.EA.COM/1/SERVICE-UPDATES. EA MAY PROVIDE CERTAIN INCREMENTAL CONTENT AND/OR UPDATES FOR NO ADDITIONAL CHARGE, IF AND WHEN AVAILABLE.
i18n.shortDescription: Discover a world full of glittering sky scrapers, beautiful vintage fashion, and happy times in Roaring Heights.
i18n.systemRequirements:
*Requires The Sims™ 3 to play.

PC System Requirements
OS: XP SP2 / Vista SP1 / Windows 7
CPU: For XP 2.0 GHz P4 processor or equivalent; For Windows Vista and Windows 7 2.4 GHz P4 processor or equivalent
RAM: For XP 1 GB RAM / Windows Vista and Windows 7 1.5 GB RAM*
DISC DRIVE: DVD drive
Hard Drive: At least 7.1GB of hard drive space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved games.
Video: 128 MB Video Card with support for Pixel Shader 2.0
* For NVIDIA ION™ computers, the game requires at least 2 GB RAM.
Supported Video Cards: Nvidia GeForce 6 series or better, and all NVidia G, GT, GTS, and GTX video cards. ATI Radeon™ series card 9500 series or better, and all ATI X, X1, and HD video cards; Intel® Graphics Media Accelerator (GMA): GMA 3-Series, GMA 4-Series
Please note that the GeForce 6100 and 7100 cards are not supported.

Mac System Requirements
OS: Mac OS X 10.5.7 Leopard or higher
CPU: Intel Core Duo Processor
RAM: 2 GB RAM
Hard Drive: At least 6.1 GB of hard drive space with at least 1 GB of additional space for custom content and saved games
Video: ATI X1600 or Nvidia 7300 GT with 128 MB of Video RAM, or Intel Integrated GMA X3100
This game will not run on PowerPC (G3/G4/G5) based Mac systems, or the GMA 950 class of integrated video cards.

itemName: The Sims 3 Roaring Heights (world) - Mac/PC - WW (Origin code issuance)
